text.div:
Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition EHDSEncounter

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
EHDSEncounter 0..*EHDSDataSet
Elements defined in Ancestors:header, presentedForm
Encounter model
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference
priority 0..1CodeableConceptPriority
Binding Description: (preferred): hl7:v3-xEncounterAdmissionUrgency
type 1..1CodeableConceptEncounter type
Binding Description: (preferred): hl7v3:ActEncounterCode
note 0..1stringA narrative description of the encounter course.
episodeOfCare 0..*EHDSEpisodeOfCareReference to the episode(s) of care that this encounter should be recorded against
basedOn[x] 0..*Reference to the request that initiated this encounter
basedOnEHDSCarePlanEHDSCarePlan
basedOnEHDSServiceRequestEHDSServiceRequest
partOf 0..1EHDSEncounterReference to another encounter this encounter is part of
serviceProvider 0..1EHDSOrganisationThe organisation (facility) responsible for this encounter
actualPeriod 0..1PeriodThe actual start and end time of the encounter
plannedStartDate 0..1dateTimeThe planned start date/time (or admission date) of the encounter
plannedEndDate 0..1dateTimeThe planned end date/time (or discharge date) of the encounter
admission 0..1BaseDetails about the admission to a healthcare service
admitter 0..1EHDSHealthProfessionalAdmitting healthcare professional
admitSource 0..1CodeableConceptFrom where the patient was admitted (e.g. physician referral, transfer).
Binding Description: (preferred): hl7:admit-source
referringProfessional 0..1EHDSHealthProfessionalReferring Healthcare Professional
reason[x] 0..*Reason(s) for admission, e.g. problem, procedure or finding.
reasonCodeableConceptCodeableConcept
reasonEHDSConditionEHDSCondition
reasonEHDSProcedureEHDSProcedure
reasonEHDSObservationEHDSObservation
reasonComment 0..1stringExplanation of the reason for the encounter.
legalStatus 0..1CodeableConceptLegal status/situation at admission (indicates the basis on which the patient is staying in a healthcare organisation).
Binding Description: (preferred): SNOMED CT
discharge 0..1BaseDischarge details
destinationType 0..1CodeableConceptType of location to which the patient will go after the encounter. E.g. home, hospital, nursing home, left against medical advice etc.
Binding Description: (preferred): hl7.discharge-disposition
destinationLocation[x] 0..1The location/organisation to which the patient will go after the encounter. Name, address and telecommunication contact.
destinationLocationEHDSOrganisationEHDSOrganisation
destinationLocationEHDSLocationEHDSLocation
location 0..*BaseList of locations where the patient has been.
period 0..1PeriodTime period during which the patient was present at the location
organisationPart[x] 1..1Organisation or organisation part (department) where the patient was present.
organisationPartEHDSOrganisationEHDSOrganisation
organisationPartEHDSLocationEHDSLocation

Documentation for this format

name: EHDSEncounter
title: Encounter model
description: EHDS refined base model for Encounter

element.short: Encounter model
element.definition: EHDS refined base model for Encounter

element.short: Common header for all patient-related data
element.definition: Common header for all patient-related data

element.short: Subject
element.definition: Patient/subject information

element.short: Business identifier for the object
element.definition: Business identifier for the object

element.short: Authorship
element.definition: Resource authoring details

element.short: Author
element.definition: Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.

element.short: Date and time of authoring/issuing
element.definition: Date and time of the issuing the document/resource by its author.

element.short: Date and time of the last update to the resource
element.definition: Date and time of the last update to the document/information

element.short: Status of the resource
element.definition: Status of the resource

element.short: Reason for the current status of the resource.
element.definition: Reason for the current status of the resource.

element.short: Language
element.definition: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

element.short: Version
element.definition: Business version of the resource.

element.short: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document
element.definition: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document

element.short: Priority
element.definition: Indicates the urgency of the encounter.

element.short: Encounter type
element.definition: The type of the encounter whether inpatient or short stay encounter.

element.short: A narrative description of the encounter course.
element.definition: A narrative description of the encounter course.

element.short: Reference to the episode(s) of care that this encounter should be recorded against
element.definition: Reference to the episode(s) of care that this encounter should be recorded against

element.short: Reference to the request that initiated this encounter
element.definition: Reference to the request that initiated this encounter

element.short: Reference to another encounter this encounter is part of
element.definition: Reference to another encounter this encounter is part of

element.short: The organisation (facility) responsible for this encounter
element.definition: The organisation (facility) responsible for this encounter

element.short: The actual start and end time of the encounter
element.definition: The actual start and end time of the encounter

element.short: The planned start date/time (or admission date) of the encounter
element.definition: The planned start date/time (or admission date) of the encounter

element.short: The planned end date/time (or discharge date) of the encounter
element.definition: The planned end date/time (or discharge date) of the encounter

element.short: Details about the admission to a healthcare service
element.definition: Details about the admission to a healthcare service

element.short: Admitting healthcare professional
element.definition: Admitting healthcare professional

element.short: From where the patient was admitted (e.g. physician referral, transfer).
element.definition: From where the patient was admitted (e.g. physician referral, transfer).

element.short: Referring Healthcare Professional
element.definition: Referring Healthcare Professional

element.short: Reason(s) for admission, e.g. problem, procedure or finding.
element.definition: Reason(s) for admission, e.g. problem, procedure or finding.

element.short: Explanation of the reason for the encounter.
element.definition: Explanation of the reason for the encounter.

element.short: Legal status/situation at admission (indicates the basis on which the patient is staying in a healthcare organisation).
element.definition: Legal status can be either voluntary or involuntary, however the legal status is always determined by a court. A patient can also receive healthcare based on a forensic status. (voluntary, involuntary, admission by legal authority).

element.short: Discharge details
element.definition: Discharge details

element.short: Type of location to which the patient will go after the encounter. E.g. home, hospital, nursing home, left against medical advice etc.
element.definition: Type of location to which the patient will go after the encounter. E.g. home, hospital, nursing home, left against medical advice etc.

element.short: The location/organisation to which the patient will go after the encounter. Name, address and telecommunication contact.
element.definition: The location/organisation to which the patient will go after the encounter. Name, address and telecommunication contact.

element.short: List of locations where the patient has been.
element.definition: List of locations where the patient has been.

element.short: Time period during which the patient was present at the location
element.definition: Time period during which the patient was present at the location

element.short: Organisation or organisation part (department) where the patient was present.
element.definition: Organisation or organisation part (department) where the patient was present.
